references.paper_title: S2-MLP: Spatial-shift MLP architecture for vision
references.reason: This paper introduces the spatial-shift MLP architecture, a key component in the proposed Deep Fourier Shifting method, which improves spatial communication efficiency in image restoration.

references.paper_title: When shift operation meets vision transformer: An extremely simple alternative to attention mechanism
references.reason: This work explores the role of spatial shift operations in Vision Transformers, providing a foundation for applying the spatial shift concept to low-level vision tasks like image restoration.

references.paper_title: Shift: A zero flop, zero parameter alternative to spatial convolutions
references.reason: This paper introduces the spatial shift operator, a core technique utilized in the proposed method, demonstrating its efficiency as a substitute for spatial convolutions.

references.paper_title: Learning to see in the dark
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work in low-light image enhancement, providing a benchmark and context for evaluating the proposed Deep Fourier Shifting method's performance on low-light image restoration tasks.

references.paper_title: Deep multi-scale convolutional neural network for dynamic scene deblurring
references.reason: This paper offers a benchmark method for image deblurring, allowing comparison of the proposed Deep Fourier Shifting approach against a state-of-the-art model in the field.
